turns.content: write an opening dialog from letterkenny where they talk about which poptart flavor is best

Wayne: Well, look who's here. How are ya now?

Daryl: Good 'n' you?

Wayne: Not so bad. What brings you boys by today?

Squirrely Dan: Oh, just thought we'd drop by and see what kind of trouble we could get into.

Wayne: Well, you've come to the right place for that. What's on your mind?

Daryl: We were just having a debate over at the produce stand about the best flavor of Pop-Tarts.

Wayne: Oh yeah? And what was the consensus?

Squirrely Dan: Well, we couldn't quite agree. I said strawberry, Daryl here said blueberry, and Katy said brown sugar cinnamon.

Wayne: Hmm, interesting. I gotta say, I'm a fan of the brown sugar cinnamon myself. But to each their own, I suppose.

Daryl: What about you, Wayne? What's your go-to flavor?

Wayne: Well, you know me, I'm a bit of a traditionalist. I stick with the classics. Can't go wrong with a good ol' fashioned cherry Pop-Tart.

Squirrely Dan: Cherry? Really?

Wayne: Yeah, why not? It's a classic for a reason.

Daryl: I don't know, man. I think blueberry's where it's at.

Squirrely Dan: But what about strawberry? It's the most versatile flavor!

Wayne: Well, I think we can all agree on one thing. Pop-Tarts are a delicious and convenient snack, no matter what flavor you prefer.
